title: Layered Dip with Ranchitas Naturales
ingredients: 2 cups of shredded taco cheese blend
instructions: Step 1. In a bowl, mix the sour cream with the lemon juice and taco seasoning.
Step 2. Layer the beans, salsa, guacamole, sour cream, cheese, and finish with lettuce and olives.
Step 3. Serve at room temperature with Ranchitas Naturales.
description: A colorful and delicious multi-layered dip combining beans, guacamole, cream and more. Ideal for parties and gatherings.
